Build your pkgdown website locally

Source: R/ros_build.R
ros_build.Rd

A wrapper of pkgdown::build_site

ros_build(pkg = ".", ...)

Arguments

pkg, ...

See ?pkgdown::build_site.

Details

This function would ask for confirmation to check your _pkgdown.yml file and would create your pkgdown site on the /docs folder.

Unlike ros_gh_actions_branch, the user would trigger the build and it is possible to control it via the parameters of pkgdown::build_site.

See also

ros_gh_actions_branch, build_site

Contents

About rostemplate

Developed by Diego Hernangómez, part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.

Template by Bootstrapious . Ported to pkgdown by dieghernan.
